## ResourceTypes.ResourceType class

Abstract base class for resource types which are responsible for validating and converting JSON values into the appropriate strongly-typed resource value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class ResourceType<T = unknown> implements IResourceType<T> 
```
**Implements:** [IResourceType](./ts-res.resourcetypes.iresourcetype.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
